name: ruby-shadow-1.9.2
description: Installs and configures all aspects of apache2 using Debian style symlinks with helper definitions
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Recipe for compiling and installing a ruby-1.9.2 compatible version of ruby-shadow.

This is a pretty quick fix for getting ruby-shadow compatible with the ruby 1.9 C extension API. It will not work with ruby 1.8.

Based on the 37 Signals ruby-shadow cookbook.
